sign-in-card.title: Welcome back
sign-in-card.description: Fill out your information to proceed

forgot-password-card.title: Forgot password
forgot-password-card.description: Enter your email to reset your password
forgot-password-card.we-sent-you-an-email: We have sent you an email that shows how you can reset your password, please check your inbox to proceed
forgot-password-card.check-spam-folder: If you can't find the email, please check your spam folder

reset-password-card.password-reset-description: Your password was successfully reset. Go back to the login page to log in with your new password
reset-password-card.new-password: Type a new password to reset

reset-password-page.this-link-is-invalid: This link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new password reset link

reset-pin-card.pin-reset-description: Your PIN has now been reset.
reset-pin-card.new-pin: Enter a new PIN to reset
